section.name: Release Description
section.p: The Release Description Documents (RDDs) detail the new and modified capabilities that comprise a particular Install Program Set release. These documents will also describe any impact that the new or modified capabilities will have on TIE operations, data providers and data consumers. The intended audience for these documents includes the TIE Test Engineer and Configuration Manager.

ul.li:
Version: 0.2.0d
Date: 2014-04-11
Description: This release of the Install Program Set is a component of the integrated release (0.2.0d) of the TIE System. This release is intended as an operational release.
